raw akas.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura

akas: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (original title)
Jesse Ventura: Off the Grid (alternative title)
akas from release info: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (original title)
Jesse Ventura: Off the Grid (alternative title)

-1.title: Episode dated 10 June 2015

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

-1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Off the Grid's Top Stories, Part 1

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: Jesse Ventura comes to you uncensored, uncut and Off the Grid with his top stories that the government doesn't want you thinking about. What are in his #5, #4 and #3 spots? Find out today - before the government finds Jesse first.

2.title: Off the Grid's Top Stories, Part 1

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: The countdown of truth continues! Uncensored and unfiltered, Jesse Ventura reveals the top two stories that the government doesn't want you thinking about.

3.title: President Ventura's State of the Union

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: Today, "Off the Grid" President Jesse Ventura gives his own State of the Union. How can you be a Vigilant Citizen? Find out today on "Off the Grid".

4.title: Gov. Gary Johnson Goes #OffTheGrid

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: "Off The Grid" welcomes its first guest, Governor Gary Johnson. The former Governor of New Mexico and Libertarian candidate for President joins Jesse Ventura to talk Obama's State of the Union, the legalization of marijuana, and Edward Snowden. How can you be a Vigilant Citizen? Stay tuned to "Off the Grid" every Tuesday through Friday at 3PM EST / 12PM PST.

5.title: Ron Paul Goes #OffTheGrid

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: Ron Paul, former Texas Congressman and host of RonPaulChannel.com, joins Jesse Ventura #OffTheGrid to discuss if Obama did anything right in his State of the Union, if Congress will actually do anything in 2014, and what to cut from the National Budget.

6.title: Alex Jones Goes #OffTheGrid

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: Alex Jones of the Alex Jones Show, InfoWars.com and PrisonPlanet.TV, joins Jesse Ventura to talk Obama's abuse of power, how to live #OffTheGrid, and whether Jesse will run in 2016.

7.title: Marianne Williamson Goes #OffTheGrid

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

7.plot: Want to know the secrets of living #OffTheGrid? In this Ventura Declaration, the Governor extolls the virtues of a life free from government tracking, TSA handling, and NSA spying. How can you #StayVigilant without a cell phone?

8.title: Episode #1.8

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

8.plot: Spiritual activist & congressional candidate Marianne Williamson joins the Governor #OffTheGrid for a candid discussion on the state of our union -- and wins his endorsement.

9.title: From the People

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

9.plot: Today on #OffTheGrid, anything goes in this no holds barred, no bullsh*t cage match of the Governor Jesse Ventura versus YOUR questions. Nothing is off limits: socialism in the USA, the JFK conspiracy, running for president, his years in pro wrestling.

10.title: Big Media Blindspots: Fukushima & the Day We Fight Back

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

10.plot: Today on #OffTheGrid, the Governor treads where Big Media won't: Fukushima. Nearly three years after the nuclear disaster, the Japanese government is trying to cover their tracks. Plus, we shine a light on TheDayWeFightBack.org. Where do you stand on Internet surveillance?

11.title: Real Life Vigilante: Edward Snowden

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

11.plot: National Security Threat or American Hero? The Governor breaks down the facts on NSA rabble-rouser, Edward Snowden. Do you think Snowden's a Real Life Vigilante?

12.title: Roger Stone Goes #OffTheGrid

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

12.plot: Political consultant and editor of StoneZone.com, Roger Stone goes off on #OffTheGrid. He and the Governor tackle the parallels between Nixon and Obama's surveillance, Chris Christie's bridge scandal, and a favorite subject of theirs: the JFK conspiracy. Do you believe Oswald was a patsy?

13.title: Adam Kokesh Goes #OffTheGrid

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

13.plot: Host of the Adam Vs. The Man podcast, Marine Corp veteran, and former Congressional candidate, Adam Kokesh is #OffTheGrid to tell the Governor about his time in Fallujah, his recent arrest outside the White House, and why he's running for President on a platform of the peaceful dissolution of the U.S. Government. Do you think our government has run its course?

14.title: Toke Up, Obama!

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

14.plot: We've all tried it, even President Obama! So what are we so afraid of? In today's #OffTheGrid, Jesse Ventura gets to the bottom of the marijuana debate. Plus, he calls out his first Poll-cat of the Day: California gubernatorial candidate Neel Kashkari.

15.title: The Secret Life of Drones

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

15.plot: You can run, you can hide, but you can't escape them... DRONES! Today on #OffTheGrid, the Governor takes on the unmanned angels of death. Should they be allowed in our airspace? Should President Obama be authorized to use them?

16.title: Ben Swann Goes #OffTheGrid

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

16.plot: Emmy-award winning journalist, Ben Swann isn't your typical news anchor - he left a successful career in Big Media behind to start his Truth in Media web series. Now he's #OffTheGrid to tell the Governor why he quit, about the state of the U.S.-Mexico border, and why he thinks Obama is a terrible president. What stories do you think Big Media should be covering?

17.title: God Vs. The U.S. Government

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

17.plot: Today on #OffTheGrid, it's the big showdown - God versus the U.S. Government - for the title of Most Powerful. Jesse Ventura sizes up the opponents and declares a winner. Plus, he answers your questions in a segment of "From the People." Who do you think should take home the big prize?

18.title: Book of the Month: Whitewash

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

18.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

19.title: God Created Gay People Too

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

19.plot: Do you think discrimination is okay? No? Then do something about it. Be active. Don't let your local government violate the human rights of others. Here, Jesse tears into the state governments of Arizona, Indiana and Kansas for discriminating against same-sex rights. Do you agree or disagree?

20.title: Edward Snowden's Legal Advisor Goes #OffTheGrid

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

20.plot: Edward Snowden's legal advisor and director of the ACLU's Speech, Privacy and Technology Project, Ben Wizner joins Jesse Ventura #OffTheGrid to discuss Snowden's status, and how the world has changed since the leak. Do you agree that Snowden's an American Hero?

21.title: DemoCRIPS Vs. ReBLOODlicans: February Cage Match

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

21.plot: The two gangs in Washington have been up to their old tricks. So Jesse Ventura takes them to the mat in this special February Cage Match edition of "DemoCRIPS Versus ReBLOODlicans" - today's #OffTheGrid topics include fake websites, post office banking, Rand Paul suing the NSA, and Obama's ambassador picks. Who do you think is the big loser in this Battle Royale?

22.title: The Sickness of the 1%

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

22.plot: Today on #OffTheGrid, Jesse Ventura slaps the silver spoon out of the one percent's mouth! The Governor is taking on the super rich and the wealth that he believes has become their sickness. Do you think the one percent's quest for cash has gotten out of control?

23.title: Whitewash of the Vietnam War

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

23.plot: The Pentagon has big plans for the 50th Anniversary of the Vietnam War, but are they commemorating the vets... or whitewashing history? On today's #OffTheGrid, Jesse Ventura gets to the bottom of the government's rewrite of the history books. Is Congress telling us the truth?

24.title: Judge Andrew Napolitano Goes #OffTheGrid

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

24.plot: Fox News' senior judicial analyst, the always candid, Judge Andrew Napolitano joins Jesse Ventura #OffTheGrid to discuss why Snowden deserves a hero's welcome, the battle to legalize same-sex marriage, and then, the Judge throws his support behind the Governor's possible presidential campaign. Should Jesse run?

25.title: #AskJesse: God Created Gays Update

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

25.plot: After Jesse Ventura declared that "God created gay people," #OffTheGrid's vigilant viewers spoke their minds. Now it's the Governor's chance to respond to you! Plus, we'll update you on the fight to legalize same-sex marriage across the U.S. Do you think gays should have equal rights?

26.title: Money Is Made Off War

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

26.plot: 2015 military spending cuts will shrink the army down to its smallest size since World War II. Dick Cheney says Obama would rather spend money on food stamps than he would on a strong military. Do these defense cuts make America weaker in the eyes of our allies and enemies?

27.title: NSA Whistleblower Thomas Drake Goes #OffTheGrid

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

27.plot: Before Edward Snowden, there was NSA whistleblower Thomas Drake, who joins Jesse Ventura #OffTheGrid to discuss his years as senior executive of the National Security Agency, his meeting with Edward Snowden in Russia, and how it feels to be called a "whistleblower." Are whistleblowers patriots or traitors?

28.title: A New Cold War?

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

28.plot: U.S. talks with Russia are a standstill over the crisis in the Ukraine. Watch Jesse's take on this dangerous game of chess between the two world superpowers. Should the U.S. intervene in Ukraine? Are we entering a new Cold War? And what's really driving this conflict? Tell the Governor what you think?

29.title: #AskJesse: The 1%, Vietnam & Judge Napolitano

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

29.plot: Ask one, ask all! The vigilant viewers emailed, tweeted and called in with their thoughts about last week's shows, and now Jesse Ventura is here to answer you! In this edition of "From the People," Jesse covers equal pay, war profiteering, assault weapon bans, and a lot more. Got something to ask the Governor?

30.title: DemoCRIPS Vs. ReBLOODlicans: Round Two!

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

30.plot: The minimum wage hasn't been raised in 7 years. It's already lost 12% of interest. In today's episode, the Governor declares to raise the minimum wage and denounces the gangs in Washington who call low-wage jobs "unskilled."

32.title: Abby Martin Goes #OffTheGrid

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

32.plot: The Governor turns the tables on Abby Martin, the outspoken host of RT's "Breaking The Set." The two discuss America's response to Martin's headline-making turn condemning military intervention in Crimea & why we need to think outside the two-party system. Agree or disagree?

33.title: #AskJesse: The Body Can Handle the Truth!

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

33.plot: But can you handle the Body's truth? Then today's "From the People" is just for you! The vigilant viewers #AskJesse his take on the Patriot Act, 9/11, assault weapon bans, clemency for pot violations, and even the Big Man Upstairs. Do you have something to ask Jesse Ventura?

34.title: Spy Wars: CIA Vs. Congress

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

34.plot: Senator Dianne Feinstein (D-CA) accuses the CIA of spying on Congress in regards to the Senate's investigation on torture. But where was her outrage when we discovered that the NSA was spying on you, the American people? Why is it okay to spy on U.S. citizens but not government officials?

35.title: The Fall of Bitcoin

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

35.plot: Can we trust cryptocurrency? Today, Jesse Ventura tackles the Bitcoin on #OffTheGrid. After Silk Road was seized and Mt. Gox closed, should we invest our hard-earned cash in the peer-to-peer decentralized digital currency? Tell the Governor what you think!

36.title: Adam Carolla Goes #OffTheGrid

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

36.plot: The always outspoken host of the Adam Carolla Show joins Jesse Ventura #OffTheGrid to discuss Snowden, Putin, and even girls jumping on trampolines. Adam Carolla holds nothing back in a hilarious discussion of hot topics, career highlights, and his new show "Catch a Contractor" on Spike TV. Check out all things Adam at AdamCarolla.com.

37.title: Book of the Month: War Is a Racket

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

37.plot: Jesse Ventura's Book Club is back on #OffTheGrid with "War Is a Racket"-- an anti-war classic written by one of America's most decorated soldiers, a two-time Congressional Medal of Honor winner, Major General Smedley Darlington Butler. Want to win your own copy of "War Is a Racket"?

38.title: Cam-PAIN in the Ass

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

38.plot: Who is more destructive to a democracy: political parties or political action committees? Today, Jesse Ventura investigates the crimes of the Super PAC-men in Washington and answers the question at hand. You won't believe what the Governor has to say about lobbyists and their bribes! What do you think of political action committees?

39.title: Big Media Blindspot: The Federal Reserve

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

39.plot: How is YOUR taxpayer money being spent? A shocking new report released by non-profit Open The Books reveals how the government funnels your money towards capitalist America. Tell the Governor what you think: should your hard-earned dollars go towards social or corporate welfare?

40.title: Josh Fox & the Anti-Fracking Movement

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

40.plot: At the heart of the U.S.-Russia conflict is a struggle for natural gas supremacy across the globe. In this interview, the Governor enlists the help of Josh Fox, director of the anti-fracking documentary "Gasland" and its follow-up "Gasland Part II," to get the lowdown on the controversial issue of natural gas and how it affects YOU. Where do you stand on fracking?

41.title: #AskJesse: NSA, 9/11 & Minimum Wage, Oh My!

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

41.plot: After a rundown of the latest on the new Big Brother, the National Security Agency, Jesse Ventura digs his teeth into a round of questions from you, #OffTheGrid's vigilant viewers! The Governor brings you the truth - loud and clear - about the 9/11 coverup controversy, if we should raise the minimum wage, and America's Darth Vader, Dick Cheney. Want to ask Jesse your own question?

42.title: Un-Common Education

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

42.plot: Governor Jesse Ventura doesn't want the federal government teaching his kids dammit! Today's #OffTheGrid is all about Common Core, the national system of educational standards. Is it a failure? Or should we give Common Core a chance? What do you think?

43.title: The Redskins Are STILL Racist

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

43.plot: Despite Washington Redskins owner Dan Snyder's "best" efforts to legitimize his team's controversial name, "redskin" is still a racist term according to the Governor Jesse Ventura! The debate rages on #OffTheGrid after Snyder set up his Washington Redskins Original Americans Foundation. Do you think Snyder's charity is merely a publicity stunt?

44.title: Cenk Uygur Goes #OffTheGrid

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

44.plot: The Young Turks' Cenk Uygur and the Governor commiserate on their censored days at MSNBC and why cable network news is becoming less and less relevant to the times we live in today. Plus, Cenk tells Jesse about his Wolf PAC -- his Super PAC to end all Super PACs from influencing future elections.

45.title: #AskJesse: Dick Cheney, Drones & Religious Welfare

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

45.plot: It's this week's episode of "From The People" - where no topic is off limits. The Governor tackles any and all of your questions, ranging from voter fraud to religious freedom - or freedom from religion. Plus, Jesse's take on a secret speech by yours truly, Dick Cheney, and... he even invents a new term.

46.title: Supreme Poll-Cats!

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

46.plot: One of the biggest scams in US history just went down in the Supreme Court! Politicians from both Washington gangs can now capitalize on their rich friends thanks to the Court's latest ruling, which strikes down any limits on how much a wealthy donor can contribute. Are you going to vote for a politician just because he or she has more money?

47.title: Big Media Blindspot: BP Spills Again?!

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

47.plot: Wait a second...did BP spill again? BP -- as in British Petroleum -- as in the same company responsible for the biggest oil spill in world history in the Gulf of Mexico back in 2010? In this Big Media Blindspot, the Governor uncovers a spill right here in Lake Michigan. But that's not all: guess what our money-hungry government just approved...more leases for BP in the Gulf! Has BP paid their dues?

48.title: Alan Colmes Goes #OffTheGrid

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

48.plot: Radio and TV personality Alan Colmes joins the Governor off the grid for a spirited discussion on a wide-range of issues: gun rights and the Second Amendment, the U.S. arms trade, and, of course, Dick "Five Deferments" Cheney. Are we in need of better mental health care or stricter gun control laws?

49.title: The Rancher Vs. The Feds

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

49.plot: The Battle Over Bundy's Cattle has taken our country by storm! And the Governor has the man himself join him #OffTheGrid to discuss what's going on in Nevada. Cliven Bundy and Jesse Ventura discuss the war over states rights, whether federal agents should be armed, and who is to blame for this standoff at the Bundy Ranch.

50.title: Bailout Busters: General Motors

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

50.plot: General Motors would rather recall 2.6 million cars than fix a 57-cent part? Today, Jesse Ventura investigates bailout beneficiary GM to find out what the hell is going on in Detroit, and how the Troubled Asset Relief Program is wrapped up in this whole mess.

51.title: William Shatner Goes #OffTheGrid

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

51.plot: William Shatner boldly goes where few men have gone before... #OffTheGrid with Jesse Ventura! Captain Kirk and the Governor talk Star Trek, Bill's new Broadway show, American political predictions, and even horses. For more on the Captain, visit ShatnersWorld.com.

52.title: Obamacare: Dr. Ventura's Diagnosis

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

52.plot: The Affordable Care Act is only a few months old, but President Obama is declaring it a success, while the Rebloodlicans say it's dead on arrival. Today, the Governor gives his #OffTheGrid take on Obamacare-- should we be so quick to diagnose its ills? What do you think?

53.title: #AskJesse: Wayward Senators, Wrestling Memories & More

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

53.plot: A senator actually showed up for work? Too bad he was in the wrong room! Today on #OffTheGrid, the Governor takes on Senator Dan Coats (R-IN), who stumbled into the wrong Senate subcommittee. Then, Jesse answers questions from the vigilant viewers about GMOs, decriminalization, and the metric system.

54.title: Book of the Month: Where Did the Towers Go?

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

54.plot: Three years ago this week, Osama Bin Laden - the man our government holds responsible for 9/11 - was killed by U.S. Special Forces during a raid in Pakistan. Starting with today's sure-to-be debated Book of the Month pick, the Governor launches a week-long investigation into the 9/11 attacks. What happened to the WTC towers? Who is ultimately responsible for that fateful day?

55.title: Counter-Conspiracy: World Trade Center 7

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

55.plot: On September 11, 2001, a third building fell in New York City. What really happened to World Trade Center 7 on that infamous day? Jesse Ventura launches his own Counter-Conspiracy investigation into the demise of Building Seven of the World Trade Center. Was it a controlled demolition? Or did fires bring it down like the 9/11 Commission Report alleges? What do you think?

57.title: 9/11 Now

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

57.plot: "If you don't want an investigation, don't fire anyone," says Jesse Ventura in regards to the "colossal failure" of the United States' security forces on 9/11. Thirteen years after that terrible day, the Governor isn't buying the BS that he believes the 9/11 Commission Report shoveled him. And as new reports of an FBI mole within al-Qaeda surface, should we believe a government that has been less than forthcoming with the truth?

58.title: Paul Ryan: The Poll-Cat

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

58.plot: The rich keep getting rich and the poor keep getting poorer...such is the unnatural order of our nation today. Jesse takes a look at those Washington poll-cats, lucrative lobbyists and money-eating corporations that continue to feed off of your own self-interests. Today, Rep. Paul Ryan is in the hot seat for taking a swipe at programs benefitting those in need. Is Ryan just using our economic crisis as way to justify cutting services to lower-income Americans?

59.title: Koch Bros. Exposed!

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

59.plot: Who are Charles and David Koch? Where did their billions come from? And why are they are running this country? Today, Jesse Ventura launches an #OffTheGrid investigation into the two puppet masters of U.S. politics behind the Americans for Prosperity super PAC.

60.title: Lyndon LaRouche Goes #OffTheGrid

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

60.plot: PART ONE: A presidential candidate in each election from 1976 to 2004, Lyndon LaRouche (LaRouchePAC.com) is a political firebrand like no other. He joins Jesse Ventura #OffTheGrid in this first of a two part interview to discuss his vast knowledge of U.S. politics, his belief that our country is the puppet of the British Empire, and who really planned the JFK assassination. PART TWO: Jesse Ventura welcomes Lyndon LaRouche (LaRouchePAC.com) back #OffTheGrid in this second part of their interview to discuss why Obama has "the mentality of Adolf Hitler in the bunker," ...

61.title: The Money Trail: Walmart

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

61.plot: For this final episode of "Stop Feeding the Rich!" the Governor encourages you, his vigilant viewers, to take a closer look at the inner workings of America's largest private employer, Walmart. Sure, you've spent your hard-earned money there...but have you ever wondered just how deeply entrenched your life is with this billion-dollar corporation?

62.title: Enter the Drone Zone!

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

62.plot: "Drones: can't live with 'em, can't live without 'em!" Today on #OffTheGrid, Jesse Ventura investigates the United States' Covert Wars as Poll-Cats in Washington propose the Targeted Lethal Force Transparency Act to keep tabs on the drone strike death toll. But is the toll the problem? Or is it the death? Got a question for the Governor? Ask him at ora.tv/offthegrid/askjesse.

63.title: The Life & Crimes of Dick Cheney

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

63.plot: Five Deferments" Dick Cheney is back, and this time he's defending torture! Jesse Ventura may be #OffTheGrid, but he isn't going to let Darth Cheney get away with it. The Governor runs down the Life and Crimes of the Ultimate Chickenhaw from his tenure at Halliburton to his time as Vice President right up to his recent justification of water boarding. What do you think was Cheney's greatest offense?

64.title: Dave Rubin Goes #OffTheGrid

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

64.plot: With the DemoCRIPS and ReBLOODlicans bracing themselves for the midterms, The Young Turks' Dave Rubin joins the Governor to encourage Americans to get out of the gridlock imposed by the two-party system. Rubin sounds off on the Clinton-Bush monarchy, offers his election predictions for the next 50 years and reveals why Jesse's 1987 film, The Running Man, is more relevant today than it was when first released! Tell the Governor what you think at ora.tv/offthegrid/askjesse.

65.title: The United Oligarchy of America

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

65.plot: Federal Reserve chair Janet Yellen can't decide if the U.S. is a democracy or an oligarchy. Well, Ms. Yellen, allow Jesse Ventura to elucidate on the matter. For this final episode on "The End of Democracy?", the Governor takes on a recent study alleging that the proof is in the pudding...we are living, without a doubt, within an oligarchy. Plus, Jesse takes your questions and comments on the state of our nation. Agree or disagree with the Governor? Message him at ora.tv/offthegrid/askjesse.

66.title: Pro-Fracking Activist Marita Noon: To Frack Or Not To Frack?

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

66.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

67.title: Greg Palast On Big Oil & Dark Money: Part 1

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

67.plot: Greg Palast, journalist & real life vigilante, joins the Governor for a two-part investigative interview that's all about the scheming behind our country's largest source of energy...OIL. Palast spills on the entire oil industry, unearthing shocking reports from BP's Deepwater Horizon disaster to revealing new allegations against the Koch Bros and their involvement in the Keystone Pipeline. Warning: for vigilant viewers only.

68.title: Greg Palast On Big Oil & Dark Money: Part 2

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

68.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

69.title: The War on Renewable Energy

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

69.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

70.title: Larry King Goes #OffTheGrid - Part 1

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

70.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

71.title: Larry King Goes #OffTheGrid - Part 2

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

71.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

72.title: Wayne Allyn Root Goes #OffTheGrid

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

72.plot: Radio Talk Show Host, regular guest on Fox News, and author of "The Ultimate Obama Survival Guide," Wayne Allyn Root joins Jesse Ventura #OffTheGrid to discuss who is to blame for the recent recession, why George W. Bush caused Root to leave the Republican Party, and how Big Government is the worst kind of government.

73.title: Tyrel Ventura Goes #OffTheGrid

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

73.plot: Today, Jesse Ventura breaks his own rule against cronyism as he invites son, the investigative reporter and filmmaker, Tyrel Ventura. He joins the Governor #OffTheGrid to discuss working on "Conspiracy Theory" together, Tyrel's feuds with Bill Maher and Rachel Maddow, and how the word "truth" has become a dirty word to our government.

74.title: Execute Capital Punishment

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

74.plot: After the horrific details of a botched lethal injection in Ohio hit the news, Jesse Ventura decided it was time to take on the death penalty. Can the United States really consider itself the Protector of the Free World when it ranks fifth in executions per year? Find out when the Governor puts capital punishment on trial in this #OffTheGrid.

75.title: Lift the Embargo

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

75.plot: 52 years and ten U.S. presidents later, our embargo on Cuba is still being enforced, but Jesse Ventura would like to see that changed. And fast! For today's #OffTheGrid, the Governor recounts his trip to Cuba, his meeting with Fidel Castro, and provides his firsthand insight on how improving trade relations with our neighbor to the south would be a win-win for both of our countries.

76.title: The Criminal IN-Justice System

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

76.plot: The Governor follows the money trail to our broken criminal justice system and exposes why the Land of the Free has more people sitting behind bars than any other country in the world. Who's making money off this so-called war on drugs? And why are addicts treated like criminals?

77.title: #AskJesse: Hit Me with Your Best Shot!

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

77.plot: Today on #OffTheGrid, you ask it and the Governor will answer! Jesse Ventura tackles your questions about martial law, immigration reform, filming "Predator," and he even plays professor to give report cards out to Presidents Obama and Bush!

78.title: The Truth About Lobbying

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

78.plot: Whether you call it "pulling favors" or "illegal bribery," it's happening all over Washington, D.C... Lobbying! Today, Jesse Ventura gets to the bottom of the lobbyists' business as he follows the Money Trail right to their doors on K Street. Without their dirty money would anything ever get done in government?

79.title: Is Now the Time for Gun Control?

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

79.plot: President Obama wants $1.1 billion for his "Now Is the Time" gun control initiative, but Jesse Ventura thinks the government needs to exercise some gun control on themselves before they try to infringe upon the Second Amendment. Plus, he takes questions and comments From the People about our right to keep and bear arms.

80.title: Counter-Conspiracy: Chemtrails

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

80.plot: Today on #OffTheGrid, we're holding our breath, until Jesse Ventura gets to the bottom of the Chemtrails Conspiracy! Is the U.S. Government poisoning our skies? Or are people mistaking vapor trails left by jets for harmful chemicals? Later, the Governor invites scientist Ken "Captain Chemtrail" Caldeira on the show to discuss his work with geoengineering our climate. Do you think the government is trying to make us sick?

81.title: #AskJesse: The Definition of a Patriot

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

81.plot: Once again, it's all about you...the vigilant viewer! What questions did you have in store for Jesse today? The Governor takes on any and every topic, including the Lincoln assassination, what makes a true patriot, and even addresses the long-running rumor about his potential 2016 presidential run.

82.title: Failures of the Fed

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

82.plot: This week's #OffTheGrid episodes tackle the latest and greatest failures of our federal government. Today, it's Jesse Ventura v. the Supreme Court's decisions on Hobby Lobby and unions dues (in Harris v. Quinn). And we wrap things up with a discussion on how our citizens, politicians and judges alike should interpret the Constitution.

83.title: Why Government Fails So Often with Peter Schuck: Part 1

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

83.plot: Why does government fail so often? Yale law professor Peter Schuck, author of the book, "Why Government Fails So Often: And How It Can Do Better," joins the Governor for a candid discussion about the poor performance of our federal programs today. In the aftermath of the VA scandal, Schuck provides a wide array of examples identifying which policies are successful...and which ones aren't. The evidence may surprise you.

84.title: with Peter Schuck: Part 2

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

84.plot: For Part II of the Governor's interview with Peter Schuck, the two take on the VA Scandal that has taken the country by storm. Who is ultimately responsible - the President, Congress, or both?

85.title: #WWJVD: What Would Jesse Ventura Do About the Feds?

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

85.plot: Today in the face of corporate personhood, confounding Supreme Court decisions, and vulgar judges, what would President Jesse do with our federal government?

86.title: Jesse Uncensored: MH17 Disaster & the Gaza Crisis

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

86.plot: If you're keeping up with the news, it may seem like the world is coming to end. Jesse speaks out on the latest headlines taking over the nation, including the downing of Malaysia Airlines Flight 17 and the current turmoil in Gaza.

87.title: Divided We Fall: The Border Crisis

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

87.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

88.title: #WWJVD: The Border Crisis

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

88.plot: Today's another edition of #WWJVD: What Would Jesse Ventura Do? Voters are divided over the chaos in the southern border where over 50,000 children from Central America have crossed into the United States. What would president Jesse do to solve this immigration crisis? Plus, a brand new "On The Grid" segment and the Governor answers your #AskJesse questions and comments.

89.title: Drugs, Guns & Immigrants

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

89.plot: While Obama ponders the immigration crisis and Congress runs from reform, Jesse gives us an education on the root of the immigration problem: our drug policy and the arms industry right here in the USA. It's a vicious cycle: the arms trade and the war on drugs means big business for big money, crippling those in Central America. What do you make of the links between our border crisis and our policies at home?

90.title: Matt Taibbi Goes #OffTheGrid: Part 1

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

90.plot: Award-winning journalist Matt Taibbi joins the Governor for a two-parter on his new book, "The Divide: American Injustice in the Age of the Wealth Gap." The two talk about the worst wrongs executed by our government, including the fact that our criminal justice system is set-up to incarcerate the poor but not the rich.

91.title: Matt Taibbi Goes #OffTheGrid: Part 2

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

91.plot: "I don't see a meaningful difference between these two administrations," says award-winning journalist Matt Taibbi of the Obama and Bush presidencies. Taibbi joins Jesse for part 2 of their interview - where they hit upon inequality in America and whether there is hope for the political future of this country. Elizabeth Warren is Taibbi's choice for 2016. Who's yours?

92.title: #WWJVD: Drugs, Guns & Immigrants

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

92.plot: For today's edition of #WWJVD, the Governor tackles the vicious cycle linking our border crisis with our drug policy at home and our arms trade. What would president Jesse do to solve this? Plus, a new poll-cat running for Governor in Minnesota & Jesse answers your #AskJesse questions and comments!

93.title: Jesse's Trial: In His Own Words

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

93.plot: The moment you've been waiting for...the Governor's take on his recent defamation case, in his own words.

94.title: Jesse Uncensored: Weapons Lost, NSA Costs, & Minimum Wage Rage!

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

94.plot: The bad news? Almost everything we can report! The good news? The Governor's here to talk about it! Today on #OffTheGrid, Jesse Ventura tackles breaking headlines about the millions of dollars in missing weapons in Afghanistan, how the NSA may cost the tech industry billions, and the earnest attempt of three politicos to live on the minimum wage.

95.title: Is There Hope for Millenials?

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

95.plot: This week is all about the young Vigilant Viewers of #OffTheGrid, the Millennials-- who they are, how they got in financial despair, and what they can do to change the world for the better. Can Jesse Ventura provide hope for a seemingly hopeless generation? Tune in all this week to Ora.TV to find out.

96.title: Gavin McInnes Goes #OffTheGrid: Part 1

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

96.plot: What begins as a gentlemanly discussion of Washington football quickly becomes a war of words between the Vice Magazine and StreetCarnage.com co-founder, Gavin McInnes, and the Governor Jesse "The Body" Ventura. Who will win this debate over a team name many have found racist? Do you think Washington needs to change their NFL name?

97.title: Gavin McInnes Goes #OffTheGrid: Part 2

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

97.plot: Grab the popcorn-- Gavin McInnes is back in the ring for Round Two with Jesse "The Body" Ventura! Today, the Governor and the Vice Magazine and StreetCarnage.com co-founder spar on what should be done about illegal immigration, if teenagers should work manual labor, and just about everything in between.

98.title: WWJVD: Hope for Millennials?

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

98.plot: As we come to the end of our #OffTheGrid week on millennials, The Governor answers this $64,000 question: What Would Jesse Ventura Do to get millennials to be vigilant citizens? Then, we take your #AskJesse questions and comments about this youngest generation.

99.title: F*** the Police State

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

99.plot: This week on #OffTheGrid, it's Jesse "The Body" Ventura versus the United Police State of America. First up, the Governor takes on the militarization of our local law enforcement, and the horrifying SWAT raids that rock Small Town America every day. How do you stay vigilant when the cops have all the power?

100.title: #WWJVD: United Police States of America

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

100.plot: What Would Jesse Ventura Do about the militarization of our law enforcement? Find out today in this special "United Police States of America" edition of #OffTheGrid. Then, the Governor takes on your questions and comments.

101.title: Police Brutality

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

101.plot: The cops are supposed to protect us - but who can protect us from the cops? Today on #OffTheGrid, Jesse Ventura takes on the tragic rash of police brutality that has struck the United States in Ferguson, Missouri, New York City, and even small town Ohio. Are badge cameras the answer? Or is accountability only the beginning of a deeper issue?

102.title: The People Respond to Police Brutality

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

102.plot: First up, Jesse Ventura's "On the Grid" crew covers a Los Angeles vigil for Michael Brown, Ezell Ford, John Crawford, Eric Garner, and all victims of police brutality. Then, the Governor takes on questions and comments from vigilant viewers in a special edition of #AskJesse.

103.title: Big Media Hysteria

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

103.plot: Open your eyes, people... "News" isn't news anymore. It's a ratings game -- and we're all pawns in this money-hungry scheme. Big media hysteria has kicked into high-gear as of late and the Governor takes on those stories that have spun out of control. Agree or disagree with Jesse? Message him at ora.tv/offthegrid/askjesse.

104.title: Ebola Outbreak: Time to Panic?

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

104.plot: Reading all the big media headlines (and some of Donald Trump's tweets) on the Ebola outbreak, you'd think we should be gearing up for a viral apocalypse at home here in the U.S. The Governor invites on The Global Dispatch's Robert Herriman, a licensed microbiologist, to discuss the outbreak currently sweeping through parts of West Africa and to clear-up some common misconceptions about the disease -- including the myth that YOU are at risk here in America. Agree or disagree?

105.title: #WWJVD: Big Media Hysteria!

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

105.plot: What to do, what to do...about Big Media Hysteria?!? Well the Governor gives it to you straight in this latest edition of "#WWJVD: What Would Jesse Ventura Do?" Plus, he takes your social media questions on the issue! Have more questions for Jesse? Shoot him a video at ora.tv/offthegrid/vigilantes!

106.title: Jesse Uncensored: ISIS, Ferguson & France

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

106.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

107.title: Ron Paul Is Back - Part 1

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

107.plot: Jesse Ventura welcomes back an old friend to #OffTheGrid, the former U.S. Representative from Texas, Dr. Ron Paul to discuss what Barack Obama should actually be sued for, if Sarah Palin can possibly lead an impeachment charge against the President, and if our economy is on the verge of massive inflation.

108.title: Ron Paul Is Back - Part 2

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

108.plot: In this second part of their #OffTheGrid conversation, Jesse Ventura and Ron Paul (voicesofliberty.com) discuss how we need to legalize marijuana at the state level, if the U.S. government is preparing for martial law, why we need to abolish the CIA, and if the only hope for 2016 is a cataclysmic failure of our government.

109.title: Ventura Declaration: Uncover 9/11!

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

109.plot: This week marks the 13th anniversary of the September 11th, 2001, attacks. In this Ventura Declaration, the Governor DEMANDS a new investigation into the greatest tragedy on American soil. Why should anything be withheld from us? If the story's true, they shouldn't lock it up! Tell us the TRUTH. Don't hide it from us.

110.title: 9 Questions for the 9/11 Commission

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

110.plot: The 9/11 Commission Report is a WHITEWASH. There are thousands of unanswered questions surrounding the darkest day in American history. The Governor presents 9 questions for the Commission that DEMAND answers. It's about time we know what really happened. What questions do you have for the 9/11 Commission?

111.title: Rep. Walter Jones Uncovers 9/11

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

111.plot: Did the Governor finally meet a republican he can support? Representative Walter Jones (R-NC) joins Jesse Ventura to discuss House Resolution 428, the bill that Jones is cosponsoring to declassify 28 pages of the 9/11 Commission Report. As Representative Jones makes clear, "The 9/11 families who lost so much have a right to this information."

112.title: Abby Martin Uncovers 9/11

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

112.plot: Nothing's off-limits with Abby Martin, host of RT America's "Breaking The Set." She certainly isn't afraid to tell it like its in regards to 9/11: why is it that the liberal establishment questions everything about the Bush administration EXCEPT 9/11? Plus, she offers some shocking revelations about her recent trip to Guantanamo Bay. What questions do you have on the 9/11 Commission Report?

113.title: The 20th Hijacker: Government Cover-Up?

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

113.plot: A Federal Appeals Court just ruled that photos taken at Guantanamo Bay of the alleged "20th hijacker" of 9/11 would remain classified. Another government cover-up? The excuse: the protection of American citizens. But ask yourself this: is the government protecting you, or is it simply protecting itself? Agree or disagree?

114.title: Ex-Marine Speaks Out Agianst 'Perpetual' Iraq War

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

114.plot: The ISIS beheadings are "bait" for the claims Matthew Hoh, a former Marine, Iraq War veteran and the first U.S. Official to quit his post in Afghanistan over the war. Hoh offers an insider's take on the Mideast crisis - and blames our "cowardly" leadership in both parties for playing right into Al Qaeda's hands. Agree or disagree?

115.title: Jesse Uncensored: Crisis Against ISIS

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

115.plot: In this latest episode, the Governor declares we MUST break away from perennial war. Big media and the government have scared enough people into thinking ISIS' next stop will be a Normandy invasion in Virginia! Agree or disagree? What do you make of the current situation in Iraq and Syria?

116.title: NFL Shame & Border Blame Game

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

116.plot: Everyone's weighing in, and now it's the Governor's chance! What will Jesse Ventura have to say about the controversy surrounding NFL players Ray Rice and Adrian Peterson? And does he agree with Governor Rick Perry and Representative Ted Poe that we need to protect the Texas-Mexico border from ISIS extremist infiltration? Plus, a special report on the FBI's collection of officer-involved shootings in Ferguson, Missouri, and around the U.S. Got a question for the Governor?

117.title: Iraq War History Lesson

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

117.plot: "Those who cannot learn from history are doomed to repeat it." That seems like a pretty good slogan for the Iraq War, doesn't it? Today on #OffTheGrid, Jesse Ventura takes us on a trip down memory lane to follow the trail of money, oil and blood that led the United States from 9/11 into Iraq. How were George W. Bush, Dick Cheney and Donald Rumsfeld able to fool the United States citizens into supporting a war built on lies? The Governor breaks it all down right now.

118.title: Iraq War: Broken Promises & False Claims

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

118.plot: The Iraq War ended almost three years ago... then why is it costing us $7.5 million a day?! To continue our history lesson on the Iraq War, Jesse Ventura details the broken promises and false claims made by the Bush and Obama administrations in our times of war and terror. Was George W. Bush's mission actually accomplished in May 2003?

119.title: Big Media Blindspot: Hurricane TYPHOON Odile

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

119.plot: Today's Big Media Blindspot focuses on Hurricane - no, sorry - TYPHOON Odile, the tropical storm which recently hit Mexico's Baja Peninsula. 80% of the population there has been left without access to food or power...and yet have you heard about this storm on the news? "We're so focused on waging war in this country," says Jesse, "we tend to forget there's devastation happening all around the world."

120.title: Top 5 Reasons to Prosecute Bush & Cheney

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

120.plot: There must be a million reasons to throw George W. Bush and Darth Cheney in the slammer, but Jesse Ventura homes in on these Top Five. What crime will take the Number One spot? Find out today on #OffTheGrid!

121.title: Gimme Tax Shelter

episode of.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura (TV Series 2014– )

121.plot: President Obama vowed to be tough on "corporate deserters" that invert their businesses, but what exactly are these tax loopholes and how are they gaming the system? Today on #OffTheGrid, Jesse Ventura investigates a new form of American ingenuity: the tax dodger.

imdb.plot outline: Off The Grid presents USA's favorite everyman. Jesse Ventura, at his best. Not one to shy away from controversy, the former Governor of Minnesota, wrestler, actor and Navy SEAL offers his electrifying insight into the nation's most pressing problems. No suits, no censors nor red tape. Just Jesse Ventura as we like him: bold, brazen, and bare knuckled.
imdb.title: Off the Grid with Jesse Ventura
plot: Off The Grid presents USA's favorite everyman. Jesse Ventura, at his best. Not one to shy away from controversy, the former Governor of Minnesota, wrestler, actor and Navy SEAL offers his electrifying insight into the nation's most pressing problems. No suits, no censors nor red tape. Just Jesse Ventura as we like him: bold, brazen, and bare knuckled.::Ben Monie
